definition: A general term referring to an object, entity, or thing, commonly used to describe physical items or abstract concepts. It is frequently employed in everyday conversations and can refer to a wide range of things, both concrete and abstract.

examples.german: Kannst du das Ding da dr√ºben holen?
examples.english: Can you fetch that thing over there?

examples.german: Ich habe keine Ahnung, was dieses Ding ist.
examples.english: I have no idea what this thing is.

examples.german: Wo hast du dieses Ding gefunden?
examples.english: Where did you find this thing?
